original_text: He lifted the heavy metal lid and there was a woman. She was sitting in the basket!
korean_text: 이 에바 가운데에는 한 여인이 앉았느니라 하니 그 때에 둥근 납 한 조각이 들리더라

sentences.original_text: He lifted the heavy metal lid
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 무거운 금속 뚜껑을 들어 올렸다

sentences.original_text: She was sitting in the basket
